Hi there! My name is Matt and I am an economist and data scientist based in Zurich, Switzerland. 

Here's a little bit about me and my life.

## Education

I hold a master's degree in economics and data analytics from the University of St. Gallen and I am particularly interested in forecasting and automation.

## Skills

I am proficient in open source programming languages such as R, Python, and Julia.

When I'm not designing beautiful analyses you will most likely find me scuba diving in lake Zurich or skiing in the snowy Alps.
